scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.audit: npm audit && cd frontend && npm audit && cd ../backend && npm audit
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix && cd frontend && npm audit fix && cd ../backend && npm audit fix
